DataElement.preferredName: Person Therapeutic Procedure Assignment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for allotting the administration of particular therapeutic agents in a clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Therapeutic Procedure Assignment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A human being.

Property.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Assignment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.: A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study.: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.
A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

PermissibleValues.value: Assign Arm C (if GFR LT 50 ml/min) or randomize (if GFR GE 50 ml/min)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Assignment Protocol Treatment Arm Identifier If Glomerular Filtration Rate Less Than Fifty Milliliter per Minute Or Randomization If Glomerular Filtration Rate Greater Than or Equal To Fifty Milliliter per Minute

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Assignment Protocol Treatment Arm Identifier If Glomerular Filtration Rate Less Than Fifty Milliliter per Minute Or Randomization If Glomerular Filtration Rate Greater Than or Equal To Fifty Milliliter per Minute
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.: A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study.: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.: A modifier term indicating a condition to follow.: A kidney function test that measures the fluid volume that is filtered from the kidney glomeruli to the Bowman's capsule per unit of time.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal to one minute.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.: A modifier term indicating a condition to follow.: A kidney function test that measures the fluid volume that is filtered from the kidney glomeruli to the Bowman's capsule per unit of time.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.: A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal t

Concepts.definition: An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.
A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
A modifier term indicating a condition to follow.
A kidney function test that measures the fluid volume that is filtered from the kidney glomeruli to the Bowman's capsule per unit of time.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.
A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal to one minute.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.
A modifier term indicating a condition to follow.
A kidney function test that measures the fluid volume that is filtered from the kidney glomeruli to the Bowman's capsule per unit of time.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than forty-nine and less than fifty-one and the quantity that it denotes.
A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal to one minute.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ReferenceDocuments.description: If physician preference is to be used and the patient has a High disease risk but without pelvic lymph node involvement, what is the preferred treatment assignment strategy?
